Texts.Chs: 回复位于^orange;克里昂大使馆^reset;的^orange;林茵将军^reset;
欢迎回到克里昂，大使。请收下这个：这是一面装饰着联盟徽章的盾牌。它本来是送给大地守护团的礼物，但现在大地守护团已经消逝，我希望你能带上它。
Texts.Eng: Welcome back to Creon, Ambassador. Please accept this: it's a shield adorned with the Alliance's emblem. It was meant as a gift to the Protectorate, but now that they are gone, I wanted you to have it.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;林茵将军^reset;需要你^green;加入他的^orange;指挥中心^reset;，大使。请尽快去拜访他，并确保随身带上您的^orange;大使通行证^reset;。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Admiral Lyiin ^reset;has requested that you ^green;join him in the ^orange;Command Center^reset;, ambassador. Please go and visit him as soon as possible, and make sure you bring your ^orange;Ambassador's Pass ^reset;with you.
